et_pb_with_border et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_1 et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light

hr.p: Dear Families and Community of Carondelet Leadership Academy:

I wanted to update you on our status in addressing the COVID-19 virus. Our focus is the safety of our students, staff and community. With one confirmed case of COVID-19 in St. Louis County, many of our families have questions regarding the virus and the impact on our school community.

We are in close communication with local and state officials and internal teams, as well as continuing to monitor the websites of the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC), the World Health Organization (WHO) and the Missouri Department of Health and Senior Services (DHSS) in order to stay on top of this evolving situation.
We are taking this situation very seriously, and will continue to update you as we have new information from public health officials.
